item.title: Getting started with behat
item.description: Functional testing as user stories # Functional tests are best described as tests for your user stories. If you’ve dealt with user stories before they normally follow the following pattern: As a [role], I want to [desire], so that [benefit/desired outcome] For the following examples we’ll use this user story as an example: As a Dungeon Master, I want to ensure harmony and mutual trust, so that the party can work together as a team The two most popular testing frameworks for functional tests in PHP are Behat and PHPSpec.
